memberdef.type: ALPWISE BLESW_CoreStack Release Notes this release Note is general for all the SDK and some changes are specific for a SDK This Notes includes changes for CORE and SDK specific sample application KNOWN ISSUES AND LIMITATIONS none REVISION we expect APPLE to fix this issue APPLE Devices impacted are the including the following LE bit Low duty Cycle directed LE Link Layer Topology(Allowing a device to be MASTER/SLAVE simultaneously and SLAVE/SLAVE simultaneously)[ADD] The Stack is now compliant with the Bluetooth Core Specification Supplement 4.[ADD] New stack configuration the application can also be interested to retrieve the device appearance It has been done to let the application managing the information it interested for In order to ease this process several API have been added or they will be removed in future ALPW BLESDk version[ADD] New GAP

[ADD] New stack configuration the application can also be interested to retrieve the device appearance It has been done to let the application managing the information it interested for In order to ease this process several API have been added or they will be removed in future ALPW BLESDk version [ADD] New GAP API

memberdef.type: ALPWISE BLESW_CoreStack Release Notes this release Note is general for all the SDK and some changes are specific for a SDK This Notes includes changes for CORE and SDK specific sample application KNOWN ISSUES AND LIMITATIONS none REVISION we expect APPLE to fix this issue APPLE Devices impacted are the including the following LE bit Low duty Cycle directed LE Link Layer Topology(Allowing a device to be MASTER/SLAVE simultaneously and SLAVE/SLAVE simultaneously)[ADD] The Stack is now compliant with the Bluetooth Core Specification Supplement 4.[ADD] New stack configuration the application can also be interested to retrieve the device appearance It has been done to let the application managing the information it interested for In order to ease this process several API have been added or they will be removed in future ALPW BLESDk version[ADD] New GAP remote device handle[MOD] Modify the way that the Attributes Handle lifetime is managed in the there is now three possible fixed handle dring all the product freezable handle during runtime or floating the core stack code hanve bben modified and several configuration options have been added or a server can now send data through INDICATIONS or NOTIFICTAION[ADD] The SERVER save into persistent memory the configuration for bonded devices It save configuration when disconnected and restore it when connected Health Thermometer[FIX]

memberdef.definition: ALPWISE BLESW_CoreStack Release Notes this release Note is general for all the SDK and some changes are specific for a SDK This Notes includes changes for CORE and SDK specific sample application KNOWN ISSUES AND LIMITATIONS none REVISION HISTORY
memberdef.name: HISTORY
memberdef.initializer:
============================================================================= 1.1.1 ============================================================================= This is a maintenance release:
This revision adds a workaround for APPLE devices sending unexpected and unsolicited data after connection leading the device using the stack to disconnect the link. The local device is not disconnecting the link anymore
